member.name: T:F2F.Testing.NUnit.Npgsql.PostgreSQLFeature
member.summary: Provides a temporary database in PostgreSQL server for a test fixture.

member.name: P:F2F.Testing.NUnit.Npgsql.PostgreSQLFeature.ConnectionString
